issue.title: [FCD] Ballot Comment US-197
issue.discussion:
Addresses US-197
There is no defined synchronization between promise::set_value and future::get.
issue.resolution: Replace "[Note: and they synchronize and serialize with other functions through the referred associated asynchronous state. --end note]" with the normative "They synchronize with (1.10) any operation on a future object with the same associated asynchronous state marked ready."
